_sText:
|||Steam Workshop Link V2 New for CSGO|||

MG_50ARENAS _V1

Brand New Map with 50 different arenaz

Finally finished this map with !50! different arenaz and insane randomness.there are so many arenas - some are small,some are big.Just fast n fun action.

Features [V1]:

  • There are total of 50 arenas and one main spawnzone [different textures,styles,sizes etc]
  • Randomness: [activates when somebody enters the center of spawnzone]
    • Random Arena [1x50 chance]
    • Random Weapons [all weapons except grenades...yeah,all ~25]
    • Random Health [50HP\100HP\150HP\200HP\1HP..really\100HP-HEADSHOTS(only with 100hp)]
    • Random Gravity [1-0.5 or 800-400 like 1\0.9\0.8\0.7\0.6\0.5 - double chance for normal gravity]
    • Random Music System ..yep [when one song ends another begins(always random+diff time)][edited cuts & fadein\out][anyway i think you'll die before the song ends]
    • Random EFFECT [1x3 chance for effects - and second 1x3(2x3 for only color effect) chance for unique graphic effect(a total of 49effects - 3maintypes\6subtypes with different styles and all colors +standart ,check it out)]
  • First player who enters the main spawnzone(center,ofcourse) will change skin color to black +alpha[little advantage in shadows or think whatever you want]
  • Custom Content
  • Music
  • No fall damage [dont try to jump into the sky]
  • 64 slots
  • NavFile


requires noblock plugin

CHANGELOG:

v1 - first public release
